item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:101 Chances: Despite a challenging year in 2023, there is hope for Plug Power in 2024. The installation of a one-megawatt proton exchange membrane electrolyzer at an Amazon fulfillment center in Colorado is a positive development for the company. The demand for hydrogen and fuel cell technology is expected to grow, providing opportunities for Plug Power to capitalize on.
